name: security-search
title: Security Search
description: Searches for securities via name to get the ISIN or via ISIN to get the name
author: benekuehn

commands.name: search-isin
commands.title: Search Isin
commands.subtitle: via Tradegate Exchange
commands.description: Find securities by name or ISIN

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
